channel.title: Epstein on un01s notes
channel.description: Recent content in Epstein on un01s notes

item.title: Story of Epstein
item.description: This is from Adam Davidson. I spent two years working on the Jeffrey Epstein podcast, Broken. I became close with many of his victims and learned a lot of stuff that–for annoying legal reasons–we can’t publish. That experience has fundamentally reshaped how I see the world. TL;DR: I knew that rich and powerful men can get away with a lot. I didn’t realize just how much they can get away with and just how much the entire system–courts, journalism, prosecutors–works inadvertently and deliberately, to reinforce their impunity.
